summary: Cake shop website featuring product images for six items (Sponge Cake, Banana Cake, Nuts cookies, Malai Cake, Kitkat chocolate cake, Honey Cake).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive cake shop website homepage that showcases six products using the user-uploaded images: "Sponge Cake.jpeg", "Banana Cake.jpeg", "Nuts cookies.jpeg", "Malai Cake.jpeg", "Kitkat chocolate cake.jpeg", and "honey cake.jpeg".

Add a product details experience for each of the six items (either a dedicated product page or an in-page modal/drawer) that opens when a user selects a product and shows at minimum: product name, larger image, and a short description (generic text is OK).

Add basic site sections suitable for a small cake shop website: a header with site name, navigation links (e.g., Home/Products/Contact), and a contact section with placeholder shop details (address/phone/email text placeholders only).

Apply a coherent bakery-themed visual design across the site (warm, appetizing palette such as cream/caramel/chocolate tones; friendly typography; soft card surfaces; subtle shadows). Avoid blue/purple as the primary theme colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a cake shop website showcasing six products with images (Sponge Cake, Banana Cake, Nuts cookies, Malai Cake, Kitkat chocolate cake, Honey Cake)

projectName: Create cake shop website showcasing 6 uploaded product images
